snippet.title: A Fistful Of Yankees | Steam Teaser | indie.io
snippet.description:
Wishlist A Fistful Of Yankees now on Steam here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2936470/A_Fistful_Of_Yankees/

Dive into the Wild West and lead a fistful of determined Yankees to restore order. Prepare you to live a great adventure in this RTS inspired by the universe of comic books and by the greatest western movies !
